Gameforest components

Find out what's included in your Bootstrap theme and how to compile source files. Includes live
examples and code snippets for every new component.

Accordions

The Gameforest collapse plugin allows you to toggle content on your pages with a few classes thanks to some helpful JavaScript.

Avatars

Avatars are images that users can set as their profile picture. They can be custom photos, uploaded by users, or generated as Identicons as a placeholder.

Example
Card
Smallville

gameforest author
Tile
Nathan Drake @nathan
Badge
Stack
Stack with text
Elizabeth,Venom and more 45 people like it.
Background

Similar for embed plugin but use the gameforest background component for add videos to the custom section or block.

Blog

Display posts on your page with the built in blog component. It is possible to list multiple or single post as a blog component.

Carousel

Touch enabled javascript plugin that lets you create a beautiful responsive carousel slider. For more examples check the official plugin documentation.

Charts

Morris.js is the library that powers the graphs on gameforest. It is a very simple API for drawing line, bar, area and donut charts.

Line Chart
Bar Chart
Area Chart
Donut Chart
Comments

Display user feedbacks under blog posts, videos or gaming reviews. Comments are perfect solution to start to build a great community for your website.

Example
Elizabeth
9 hours ago

Attended no do thoughts me on dissuade scarcely. Own are pretty spring suffer old denote his. By proposal speedily mr striking am. But attention sex questions applauded how happiness.

Disqus
Facebook
DataTables

DataTables is a plug-in for the jQuery Javascript library. It is a highly flexible tool, build upon the foundations of progressive enhancement, that adds all of these advanced features to any HTML table.

 avatar username email role action
Nathan Drake nathan@drake.com author
Trevor trevor@gtav.com admin
Elizabeth elizabeth@gs.com member
DatePicker

Flatpickr is a lightweight and powerful datetime picker. Lean, UX-driven, and extensible, yet it doesn’t depend on any libraries.

Inline calendar
Example
DateTime
Time Picker
Embed

Allow browsers to determine video or slideshow dimensions based on the width of their containing block by creating an intrinsic ratio that will properly scale on any device.

Icons

Documentation and examples for icons, nucleo premium icon library. Add the chosen icon to custom components like button or cards etc.

Sizes
SVG Icon
Lightbox

Add image to the current page in a popup box by using gameforest lightweight lightbox component. Easy to use and can be customized in several ways.

Example
Open lightbox Open Gallery

Youtube Twitch

Documentation for built in notificiation with bootstrap alert component. Easy to use just check the available examples below.

Text Editor

God of War

Released April 20, 2018

Platforms:
PS4
Developer
SCE Santa Monica
Publisher
Sony Interactive Entertainment
Genre
Action, Adventure

The gods of Olympus believe their brother Ares to be insane, but they are commanded to take no action against him. The contemptuous Lord of War's siblings are bound by their father Zeus law to not clash with one another directly.

About Gameforest

Gameforest is a Bootstrap Gaming theme what is built on the world's most popular front-end framework. Clean and well coded professional front-end files are included in your downloaded package.

Purchase theme
